atk-abh03a43:1_1: Idāni teyeva mūlayamake desite kusalādidhamme dhātuvasena saṅgaṇhitvā āyatanayamakānantaraṁ desitassa dhātuyamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a43:1_4: avasesā antaravārā ca saddhiṁ kālappabhedādīhi āyatanayamake āgatasadisāyeva.
atk-abh03a43:1_5: Idhāpi ca yamakapucchāsukhatthaṁ paṭipāṭiyā ajjhattikabāhirā rūpadhātuyova vatvā viññāṇadhātuyo vuttā.
atk-abh03a43:1_6: Dhātūnaṁ pana bahuttā idha āyatanayamakato bahutarāni yamakāni,
atk-abh03a43:1_9: Tattha cakkhudhātumūlakādīsu yamakesu labbhamānānaṁ yamakānaṁ atthavinicchayo āyatanayamake vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
